confirmDialog.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to do that ?

help.0: 0 : Video will be stopped when emulationstation is ready to start
help.1: -1 : All the video will be played before emulationstation start (default)
help.2: > 0 : Time the video will be played before emulationstation start

help.default: default is the default behaviour with all options

systemlist.label: Displayed systems list
systemlist.help: Set the system list from which ES will run random games. Empty list or unexisting key means all available systems.

duration.label: Demo duration ( 30 à 600 s )
duration.help:
Default demo game sessions last 90s.

Change this value if you want shorter or longer sessions.

infoscreenduration.label: Info screen duration ( 15 à 30 s )
infoscreenduration.help:
Default game info screen duration lasts 6s.

Change this value if you want shorter or longer info screens.

backgroundMusic.title: Background music
backgroundMusic.help: You need to restart EmulationStation to activate this feature

wifi.title: Wi-Fi

region.title: Wifi country code
region.help: The default value is JP because this country is the most permissive for wifi.

wifi.help:
Please note: any misconfiguration would lead to your recalbox being unavailable on the network.

The passwords are encrypted and are not re-displayed. This does not mean that the fields are emtpy! If you enter a new value, it will overwrite the old one.

videomode.label: Video mode
videomode.help: There are two groups of video modes: CEA and DMT. Make sure the mode is compatible with your native screen resolution.

help.bartop: bartop has filtered options, suitable for bartops

startFromFirstSystem.label: Start on the list of games from the first system (or the one selected)
startFromFirstSystem.help: ES will launch and display the list of games from the first system (or the one selected).

disableSystemSelection.label: Disable the system selection
disableSystemSelection.help: ES will launch and display ONLY the first system (or the one selected).

showOnlyScrapedGames.label: Show only scraped games
showOnlyScrapedGames.help: ES will only display the games included in the gamelist.xml files (accelerates display times).

delay.title: Delay
delay.help: Delay before Videosnaps start, in millisecond. Default: 2s ( 2000 )

loop.title: Video loop times
loop.help: 0 = no video. 1 or more = the video loops x times before fading out

help.required: required kodi does not launch before being able to reach the specified ip address
help.wish: wish uses a countdown timer before starting

waitTime.title: Wait time
waitTime.help: Waiting time (seconds) before kodi startup fails ("required") or continue ("wish")

videomode.label: Video mode
videomode.help: There are two groups of video modes: CEA and DMT. Make sure the mode is compatible with your native screen resolution.

help.custom: custom allows you to choose and activate a custom shader
help.retro: retro set the "best" shader for each system, as chosen by the community. This will give you the gaming experience closest to the original system

integerscale.label: Enables pixel perfect
integerscale.help: Activate the "Pixel Perfect" image scaling mode which is to get the exact rendering of the games on a modern screen.

rewind.title: Rewind
rewind.label: Enables rewind
rewind.help: The rewind option allows you to rewind the game whilst playing. This can slowdown some emulators (snes, psx) if you enable it.

autosave.title: Auto save
autosave.label: Enables automatic backup / load
autosave.help:
This option allows you to create an automatic backup of your game when you exit it, then to load it again when you restart it.

Once the game is launched and the backup loaded, if you want to return to the title screen of the game, use the special reset command.

translateFrom.label: Source language
translateFrom.help: Setting the source language may speed up or give more accurate results.

translateTo.label: Target language
translateTo.help: The default value is extracted from system language or, if system language is undefined, set to auto (EN).

translateApiKey.label: zTranslate API Key
translateApiKey.help:
Go to https://ztranslate.net and create an account.

validate your account, then log in and go to the settings page and get the API Key at the bottom.

translateUrl.label: Other translation service URL
translateUrl.help:
If you want to use another translation service or a custom API call, use this key to specify the url to call.

If the key is not empty, it is used instead of zTranslation's API Key.

activate.label: Enable RetroAchievements
activate.help:
RetroAchievements.org is a community website that allows you to win custom-made achievements for retro games.

Achievements are made by and for the community.

hardcore.label: Enable Hardcore mode
hardcore.help:
The Hardcore mode deactivates all possibilities of saving in the emulator! You won't be able to save or reload your game whilst playing.

You have to complete the game and get the achievements first time, just like it was on the original console.

activate.label: Enables "Arcade" meta system
activate.help: Activate the Arcade metasystem to group all games from piFBA, FBN (libretro), MAME and optionally Neogeo into a single "Arcade" system.

position.label: "Arcade" system position
position.help: You may want to specify its position in the system list. Default position is 0, negatives values may be used to start from the end.

includeNeogeo.label: Include Neogeo
includeNeogeo.help: Include NeoGeo or not in the meta system "Arcade".

hideOriginals.label: Hide originals systems
hideOriginals.help: Hide included system or leave them in the system list.

activate.label: Enables netplay
activate.help: Netplay is a feature allowing networked multiplayer mode with some emulators via peer-to-peer (P2P) networking.

nickname.label: Nickname
nickname.help: Configure your nickname, be careful not to put an accent, this prevents the operation of Netplay.

relay.label: Netplay MITM Server relay
relay.help:
The Netplay MITM, Relay Server option allows you to override the opening of your modem ports.
This allows both sides of the connection to be routed through an intermediary server.

However this will have an impact on the speed at which the data synchronizes and therefore on the responsiveness of the game..

lobby.label: Libretro lobby
lobby.help:
URL of the libretro lobby list to use.

The URL "http://lobby.libretro.com/list/" is configured by default.

remove.text: Are you sure you want to delete this BIOS ?

tooltips.yellow: Optional BIOS not present or wrong MD5
tooltips.red: Mandatory BIOS not present or wrong MD5

redFilter.label: Filter not present or wrong MD5 mandatory BIOS

orangeFilter.label: Filter not present or wrong MD5 optional BIOS

yellow_1.title: Optionnal BIOS present + wrong MD5
yellow_1.text: It may work, but since no one from us has tested it, we can't guarantee anything.

yellow_2.title: Optionnal BIOS absent
yellow_2.text: It can work, as long as you don't use a game or a feature that requires this optional bios

red.title: Mandatory BIOS missing or wrong MD5

remove.text: Are you sure you want to delete this ROM ?

xarcade.title: XArcade
xarcade.enabled: XArcade Tankstik and compatible controllers support

remove.text: Are you sure you want to delete this screenshot ?
